CustomField.description: The "Primary Sector" field categorizes records based on their primary sector affiliation. This classification helps distinguish entities or organizations by their operational structure & ownership. Select one of the following values:
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Public: Use this option if the record primarily belongs to the public sector, which typically includes government agencies, public services, and organizations funded by taxpayers. Semi-public: Use this option if the record primarily pertains to semi-public entities, such as non-profit organizations, public-private partnerships, or institutions with mixed funding sources. Private: Use this option if the record primarily represents private sector entities, including for-profit businesses, privately owned.
CustomField.label: Primary Sector
